research_history: Founded in 1970, Harvard University is known for its groundbreaking research.

detail.admission_process: To apply for admission, visit the university website and submit the online application form.
detail.research_work: Harvard University has made significant contributions to various research areas, including arts and humanities.

research_history: Stanford University was established in 2000, focusing on cutting-edge research in engineering.

detail.admission_process: To apply for admission, fill out the application form available on the institute's official website.
detail.research_work: Stanford University has been actively collaborating on research projects with industry partners.

research_history: Yale University was established in 1950 and has a rich history of promoting arts and culture.

detail.admission_process: To apply for admission, visit the college admissions office and submit the required documents.

event_details.Art Exhibition: Date: September 10-12, 2023, Venue: College Art Gallery
event_details.Literary Fest: Date: October 25-27, 2023, Venue: College Seminar Hall

detail.research_work: Yale University actively supports research and exploration in various artistic disciplines.
